response.original_title: Mischief: JDM Mischief - Attack of the Killer Tuners
response.overview: "Teckademics comes back with a full-frontal assault in JDM Mischief 2 featuring the sickest Japanese turner cars and babes on the planet. This sequel delivers some top-speed action at the Super Street Time Attack featuring the Automotive Forums Skyline GTR34 and the GMG World Challenge Porsche GT3 Cup Car!  Next, strap in for a ride with the AMS Mitsubishi EVO as it hits the track...and get a sneak peek at HKS EVO Time Attack killer!  We also take you drifting with Drift Alliance's own Chris Forsberg and unsponsored phenom Justin Pollock as they take over the mountainous Horse Thief Mile course at Willow Springs Raceway. The Crazy Swede Sam Hibinetter give us an inside look at his new Mopar Charger drift car set to compete against all the JDM monsters.  The action does't stop there as the Teck army invades the wildest car shows and model shoots around. Get an all-access pass to some of the hottest photoshoots and parties around."
response.title: Mischief: JDM Mischief - Attack of the Killer Tuners
